title: TECH Clean California: $120M in Good News for the Climate - NRDC (Natural Resources Defense Council)
content: TECH Clean California: $120M in Good News for the Climate  NRDC (Natural Resources Defense Council)
description: The recent launch of TECH Clean California represents a significant milestone in the effort to equitably decarbonize California’s buildings in line with our pressing climate goals. What’s in the $120 million program, and how can Californians take advantage TECH's electrification...
